post.body: soooo sorry! I have family that don't understand this at times and it is completly physically obvious
joyofspirit she has a butterfly?
I didn't forget!! Don't you worry! And u have a son right?
wahooo glad to see u look like your self again! U should put on a tiara on you like mine for new years!!
well that was very cool of u to find it out!
that would be nice! I love Cape May!
ohhhh yes! My blog is on the local newspaper site! Crazy how the community has been rallying around me!!
haha did you figure that out!!! Wow! Amazing you are!!!!
it's terrible! I know!
yes that would be nice! It is beautiful here then! What are you traveling for just your blog?
she said she was posting a RAk post and I was like huh????
it is so around in Cape May County!
haa do you know?
heading to cape may yet???
it was very scary!
that is very rough! I was flipping out because I wondered that when they were throwing diagnoses around! I am a mommy
she is actually one of your followers
haha no it was funny I was following her and I wanted to know why she wasn't following me back!
Haha I am trying to figure out what it means? Do you know???
yes so blessed. 4 strangers showed up and cleaned one top of the house to the other. The others bring meals! We are loved
